Name: RedEx
About the game: About the Game Get ready for adventure playing as a brave saboteur who is eager to wreak havoc on the RedExpress logistics corporation. Fight the mercenaries of this filthy underground business, deciding the fate of RedEx forever. Game Features Tower Defense mechanics - no one restricts you in filling the field with turrets or dummies. The game is just a playground for your imagination. Look for the best tactics, fill the field not only with red bodies, but also with your technique! A varied arsenal, ranging from simple pistols to powerful calibers. A selection of unique characters that will radically change the style of your gameplay. Nice visual component and style of the game Many different enemies with an even wider variety of weapons. Location bosses you'll hate! Upgrade your character, making it even stronger! And much more... Waiting for you in RedEx
